Uses of Interface
twitter4j.TwitterStream

    • Uses of TwitterStream in twitter4j

      Methods in twitter4j that return TwitterStream 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TwitterStream TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance()
      Returns a instance associated with the configuration bound to this factory.
      TwitterStream TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance(AccessToken accessToken)
      Returns a OAuth Authenticated instance.
      consumer key and consumer Secret must be provided by twitter4j.properties, or system properties.
      TwitterStream TwitterStreamFactory.getInstance(Authorization auth)
      Returns a instance.
      static TwitterStream TwitterStreamFactory.getSingleton()
      Returns default singleton TwitterStream instance.
